title: The Cruel Twists of Love
description: Note: Alternate/new cover edition for ASIN# B00BAES8WMHelen's world was turned upside down after an assault on her at a nightclub.The man who came to her aid seemed sweet and caring at first but she soon realized he got a darker side to his nature…Could she learn to accept this side of his nature or would their relationship be doomed to fail…Confused by her inexperience and her own sexual desires for this dangerous man that starts her on an emotional journey of Sexual discovery…* revised edition
author: Kathryn Morgan Parry
